日本西南學院大學開日語暑期夏令營的課程。
他們有近乎20年的日語教學經驗，這次有5種不同的課程可以選擇
課程（為期 4 週的日語和文化課程）
【期間】2023年6月19日-7月19日   《級別》入門級、初級到高級班（4級）
申請截止日期：2023 年 3 月 31 日
報名費用：日幣（12,000）預計新台幣（2,800）不可退還
課程費用：日幣（170,000）預計新台幣（38,000）
課程費用包含了課程費、課程素材、住宿費、戶外教學費用。

SEINAN Summer Japanese Program 2023 (IN-PERSON) is now open
We are very honored that we have been running this program for almost
20 years with great success. Also, we are pleased to inform you that,
There are 5 types of programs to choose from depending on the
participant’s Japanese level and preference.
The programs we are offering for Summer 2024 are as follows
[Levels] Introductory to Advanced Japanese Class  (5 level) (4-week Japanese and Culture Program)
[Period] June 19h – July 19th, 2024
Application Deadline:March 31st, 2024
Application Fee: JPY(12,000) NTD (2,800) Non Refundable
Program Fee: JPY (170,000) NTD(38,000)
Program Fee included tuituion fee, Course Materials, Accomodations on campus, Field Trips.

More Info: https://oia.ndhu.edu.tw/2024/01/14057.html
